text: @markknoller @PressSec "It's a personal choice"?! NO! It is NOT "a personal choice"! It is a medical & scientific FACT that wearing masks decreases the spread of COVID19. Is this woman as stupid as she looks & sounds?! So far every single one of Trump's Press Secretaries has been a blithering idiot!
